ygData.subject: Re: Staff of writhing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ever since I went through all the trouble to get myself a Screaming Mace, and then finding out it screws up bard songs I ve decided to stay away from
ygData.messageBody:
>From: David Rubino <tigger@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Staff of writhing
>Date: Tue, 25 May 1999 00:52:30 -0700
>
>From: David Rubino <tigger@...>
>
>
>From the EQLizer:
>
>The staff of writhing is one of the various skull staff's in the game(which
>look similar to the staff that the Priest of Discord is equipping). This
>particular staff is a 1 handed blunt weapon and can be equipped by
>Necromancers, Enchanters, Wizards, Magicians and Bards. It has a damage of
>9, a delay of 33 and has the effect of chaotic feedback(which does 48
>points of damage when successful).
>
>I haven't been impressed with most weapons I have seen so far, but this
>sounds like a real treat. Any idea where to find one?
>
>I would be willing to train my 1H Blunt to use this, since it has a very
>nice magical effect.
>
>Working on using EQLizer for some complete weapon analysis, will post soon.
>
>-Musil
>

Ever since I went through all the trouble to get myself a Screaming Mace,
and then finding out it screws up bard songs I've decided to stay away from
weapons that have an added magical effect (even though ppl are saying there
is a way around it).
I wouldn't mind getting a crystalline sword though =)
Anyone? Anyone??

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin
Veeshan
